name: Knights vs World
description:
Knights vs World In Knights vs World kämpfst du mit deinem kleinen Krieger gegen eine Horde von Gegnern. Erobere in  jedem Level alle drei Banner und die glänzende Goldtruhe. Verdiene dir deinen Sold, den du dafür ausgeben kannst, um neue Level freizuschalten. Gib alles, um der reichste und berühmteste Ritter der Welt zu werden. (German description)

In Knights vs World you lead your little warrior against a bunch of enemies, to conquer all three banners and the golden chest of each level. 

Through fighting and conquering you earn a ton of coins you can spend to unlock new levels. Hack and slash your way from left to right and become the most rich and famous knight of the world, of course.

Bare in mind that this project is just a small mobile game study of mine. There will be only two characters to choose from and one world with eight levels to conquer. Don't judge to much, it is all about learning and having fun.

The blue knight represents the „Berliner Rittergilde“, a reenactment club based in Berlin, Germany, that improvises medieval stage combat with armor, sword and shield. They are really awesome and inspiring. Just take a look here: 

https://www.berliner-rittergilde.de/ritter/ueber-uns/
